overview: This official music video for the band ALESTORM was made during the 2020 COVID 19 quarantine from March to June 2020. 30 students currently enrolled in the Bachelor of Design (Animation & Interactive Media) at RMIT University in Melbourne Australia contributed their work from their homes via internet, coordinated by RMIT lecturer Simon Norton. Result = Animated Foul-mouthed Singing Pirates!!
title: Shit Boat
